ability.name: Rolling Bones
ability.description: * Origami Folding now triggers when there are 6 cards, rather than 8. * Do not discard cards from Origami Folding when it triggers. * When there are 18 cards on Rolling Bones: * Gain 1 Corruption Point. * Discard all cards from Rolling Bones. * Deal 18 Magic Damage.
ability.flavor: "Let's see what the future holds. Oh... it's bad. It's really bad. You should probably run."
